title: [BUG] SKTouchEventArgs.Id is always 0
body:
**Description**

SKTouchEventArgs.Id

**Code**

```
 protected override void OnTouch(SKTouchEventArgs e)
 {
            Log.Debug("Canvas OnTouch Action {0} Id {1} X {2} Y {3}", e.ActionType, e.Id, e.Location.X, e.Location.Y);
 }
```

**Expected Behavior**

Id is unique 

**Actual Behavior**

Id is 0
**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.2
- Last known good version:  Unknown
- IDE:  Visual Studio 
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - Android: 11
- Target Devices: 
  -  Google Pixel 3a XL Q



**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6060545/106935080-d248f100-6712-11eb-852c-1ceb9b9fbe9f.png)
